post.title: AI cameras at Home Depot and Lowes shared with police
post.excerpt: Home improvement stores Lowe's and Home Depot are sharing data from their AI-powered license plate reader cameras with law enforcement, forming a surveillance network. This network allows police access to data from over 173 locations across the U.S. https://www.404media.co/home-depot-and-lowes-share-data-from-hundreds-of-ai-cameras-with-cops/
post.content: Home improvement stores Lowe's and Home Depot are sharing data from their AI-powered license plate reader cameras with law enforcement, forming a surveillance network. This network allows police access to data from over 173 locations across the U.S. https://www.404media.co/home-depot-and-lowes-share-data-from-hundreds-of-ai-cameras-with-cops/
